survey_name: Parental Control App Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how parents use parental control apps, their satisfaction levels, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which parental control app(s) do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and an 'Other' option for apps not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which parental control app(s) do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current parental control app?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected an app in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.
